aws_api_gateway_documentation_part.description: Provides a settings of an API Gateway Documentation Part.

location.description: The location of the targeted API entity of the to-be-created documentation part. See below.

properties.description: A content map of API-specific key-value pairs describing the targeted API entity. The map must be encoded as a JSON string, e.g., "{ \"description\": \"The API does ...\" }". Only Swagger-compliant key-value pairs can be exported and, hence, published.

rest_api_id.description: The ID of the associated Rest API
